Question: When a company wants to earn a profit of $42,000, which of following is the number of units that the company must sell under the conditions shown in the table below?Unit dollarSelling price per unit: 17Fixed costs: 134,000Interest expense: 10,000Variable costs per unit: 12Cost of sales and administrative expense: 6(Units)

Which of the following is part of total quality management?a) Designing products and services that meet or exceed customers’ expectationsb) Focusing on the appointment of a special committee to ensure employee involvement in a similar environmentc) Prioritizing central decisions rather than empowerment to ensure the quality of products producedd) Maintaining the equal opportunity rather than being competitively involved in a competitive manner

Choices.a: Designing products and services that meet or exceed customers’ expectations
Choices.b: Focusing on the appointment of a special committee to ensure employee involvement in a similar environment
Choices.c: Prioritizing central decisions rather than empowerment to ensure the quality of products produced
Choices.d: Maintaining the equal opportunity rather than being competitively involved in a competitive manner
